item.title: 贝莱德加拿大主管 Marcia Moffat 将于 2026 年离职
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社看到的一份内部备忘录，贝莱德公司加拿大部门主管玛西娅-莫法特（Marcia Moffat）将于明年离职。【原文：The head of BlackRock Inc.’s Canadian unit, Marcia Moffat, will leave the firm next year, according to an internal memo seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 沃勒成为特朗普团队中美联储主席的热门人选
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）正在成为唐纳德-特朗普总统的顾问们寻找杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）接班人时担任央行主席的热门人选。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller is emerging as a top candidate to serve as the central bank’s chair among President Donald Trump’s advisers as they look for a replacement for Jerome Powell, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 私人信贷大力发展开放式基金以吸引散户资金
item.description: 私人信贷正竭尽全力吸引散户投资者，其开放式投资工具越来越受欢迎，为这个快速发展的行业带来了一系列新的风险。【原文：Private credit is pulling out all the stops to attract retail investors with increasingly popular open-ended vehicles that are bringing a new set of risks for the fast-growing industry.】

item.title: 美国电池初创企业 Lyten 收购 Northvolt 在欧洲的剩余业务
item.description: 加利福尼亚州一家开发锂硫电池的初创公司 Lyten Inc. 已同意收购破产制造商 Northvolt AB 在欧洲的全部剩余资产。【原文：Lyten Inc., a California startup that develops lithium-sulfur batteries, has agreed to acquire all of the remaining European assets of bankrupt manufacturer Northvolt AB.】

item.title: 印度出口商权衡应对 "比科威德更糟糕 "的美国征税方案
item.description: 依靠美国人对平价商品的需求建立起业务的印度出口商正在重新制定战略，权衡各种替代方案，以减轻美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对进口商品征收 50%的冲击税所带来的痛苦。【原文：Indian exporters who built their businesses on Americans’ demand for affordable goods are redrawing their strategies and weighing alternatives to reduce the pain from US President Donald Trump’s shock 50% levy on imports.】

item.title: 美国股市因芯片关税豁免和降息希望而上涨
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布对芯片关税给予部分豁免，以及最新经济数据增强了美联储下月降息的预期，美国股市上涨。【原文：US stocks rose as President Donald Trump announced some exemptions for tariffs on chips and as latest economic data reinforced expectations that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates next month.】

item.title: 苹果股价反弹即将克服技术障碍
item.description: 苹果公司（Apple Inc. ）连续两天的大涨使其即将结束在一个关键技术门槛下的长期运行。【原文：Apple Inc.’s two-day surge has it on the cusp of ending a prolonged run under a key technical threshold that’s been symbolic of its struggle to convince investors that it can deliver on artificial intelligence and manage its tariff risks.】

item.title: 赫兹租赁公司亏损好于预期，股价大涨
item.description: 赫兹全球控股公司（Hertz Global Holdings Inc. ）第二季度亏损较上年同期有所改善，超出华尔街预期，这对管理层重振业务的努力大有裨益，该公司股价因此大涨。【原文：Hertz Global Holdings Inc. shares surged after the company’s second-quarter loss improved from a year ago and beat Wall Street’s expectations, a boon for management’s effort to rejuvenate the business.】

item.title: 瑞士政府仍在与美国商谈降低关税事宜
item.description: 瑞士表示将继续与美国谈判，以降低周四生效的39%的关税，并避免实施反制措施。【原文：Switzerland said it will continue to negotiate with the US to lower tariffs from the 39% that kicked in on Thursday and refrained from implementing countermeasures.】

item.title: 投资者未受特朗普 100% 半导体关税威胁的影响
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁要对芯片进口征收 100%的关税，这让分析师们感到困惑，而在该行业试图找出哪些生产和设计半导体的公司可能会受到冲击时，股价却没有什么变化。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s threat to impose a 100% tariff on chip imports left analysts puzzled and shares little changed as the industry tried to work out which companies that make and design semiconductors could be hit.】

item.title: Huw Van Steenis 谈私人信贷的下一件大事
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. item.title: 英国央行行长贝利称赞鲍威尔是 "最正直 "的朋友
item.description: 英国央行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）对美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）大加赞赏，而此时他的同僚正受到美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的攻击。【原文：Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey offered praise for Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell at a time when his peer is under attack from President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 贝森特说，劳动力数据清理工作早该开始了
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）在一份意外疲软的就业报告发布数小时后，为唐纳德-特朗普总统解雇负责报告美国劳动力数据的机构负责人进行了辩护，称早该进行改革了。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent defended President Donald Trump’s firing of the head of the agency that reports US labor data hours after an unexpectedly weak jobs report, saying a revamp was long overdue.】

item.title: 美国连续申请失业救济人数升至 2021 年底以来最高点
item.description: 失业救济金的经常性申请激增至 2021 年 11 月以来的最高值，使近期劳动力市场疲软的迹象更加明显。【原文：Recurring applications for unemployment benefits surged to the highest since November 2021, adding to recent signs that the labor market is weakening.】

item.title: 美国汽车安全监管机构上月寻求特斯拉机器人出租车搭乘服务
item.description: 美国安全监管机构正在调查特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：The US safety regulator investigating the suite of features Tesla Inc. markets as Full Self-Driving has sought to test the carmaker’s recently launched driverless-taxi service, a sign of the close tabs authorities are keeping on the technology.】

item.title: 美国第二季度生产率回升，产出增加
item.description: 美国第二季度的劳动生产率与经济同步回升，恢复了效率提高的趋势，这有助于抑制与工资相关的通胀压力。【原文：US labor productivity rebounded in the second quarter along with the economy, resuming a trend of efficiency gains that are helping keep a lid on wage-related inflationary pressures.】

item.title: 捷克保持利率不变，政策制定者对房价表示担忧
item.description: 捷克中央银行在第二次会议上维持利率不变，在此之前，由于担心房价飙升，一些决策者发出了结束货币宽松政策的信号。【原文：The Czech central bank held interest rates for a second meeting after some policymakers signaled an end to monetary easing due to concerns over soaring housing prices.】

item.title: 莫迪将与卢拉通话，计划会晤习近平，因与美国关系变差
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪可能会在周四与巴西总理通话，并有望在八月份七年来首次访问中国，这是在与美国关系恶化的背景下发生的。【原文：Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi is likely to speak with his Brazilian counterpart on Thursday and is expected to head to China for the first time in seven years in August, people familiar with the matter said, coming against the backdrop of worsening ties with the US.】

item.title: 墨西哥年通胀率创 2020 年以来新低
item.description: 在墨西哥中央银行周四晚些时候召开利率制定会议之前，墨西哥 7 月份总体通胀率的放缓幅度略高于预期，创下了自 2020 年底以来的最低水平。【原文：Mexico’s headline inflation in July slowed slightly more than expected, hitting the lowest level since late 2020 ahead of the central bank’s interest-rate setting meeting later Thursday.】

item.title: 加密货币，没有美元的玻利维亚人的新生命线
item.description:
许多坚定的加密货币拥护者都认为：数字资产不仅仅用于投机，而且是一种更好的交易方式，而该国正是这一观点的重要验证案例。【原文：

El país es un importante caso de pruebas para una visión que comparten muchos defensores acérrimos de las criptomonedas: los activos digitales no son solo para especular, sino que son una forma mejor de hacer comercio.

item.title: 在通胀率高达 25% 的国家，加密货币开始取代货币
item.description:
玻利维亚是许多加密货币忠实拥护者所持信念的一个重要测试案例：数字资产不仅仅用于投机，还是一种更好的商业方式。【原文：

Bolivia is a major test case for a belief held by many crypto diehards: digital assets aren’t merely for speculation, they’re a better way to do commerce.

】

item.title: Firefly Aerospace 历经波折后将上市
item.description: Firefly Aerospace 公司的股票将于本周四开始在纽约交易，这标志着这家在破产和动荡中幸存下来的公司将迎来新的发展。【原文：Shares in Firefly Aerospace will start trading on Thursday in New York, marking the next evolution for a company that survived bankruptcy and turmoil to develop its own fleet of rockets and successfully land a private spacecraft on the moon.】

item.title: 冠军头衔拥有者因高尔夫球手不惧恶劣天气而创下销售纪录
item.description: Acushnet Holdings Corp. 公布了创纪录的季度销售额，原因是高尔夫球手不断在装备上消费，这证明了这项运动在天气恶劣的季度里仍具有顽强的生命力。【原文：Acushnet Holdings Corp. posted record quarterly sales as golfers kept spending on gear, proving the sport’s resilience during a quarter plagued by poor weather.】

item.title: 特朗普敦促英特尔首席执行官辞职，称他 "矛盾重重
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普要求英特尔公司首席执行官辞职，因为他认为这存在利益冲突。【原文：President Donald Trump called on the chief executive officer of Intel Corp. to resign because of what he called conflicts of interest.】

item.title: 品牌审查持续进行，Kenvue 因需求疲软下调前景展望
item.description: 由于需求持续恶化，Kenvue 公司下调了全年销售目标，并在寻找新的首席执行官来帮助公司重整业务。【原文：Kenvue Inc. slashed its full-year sales target as demand continued to deteriorate and the company searches for a new chief executive officer to help reset the business.】

item.title: 礼来肥胖症药物令人失望，诺和诺德飙升，令人欣慰
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）股价飙升，原因是竞争对手礼来公司（Eli Lilly & Co.【原文：Novo Nordisk A/S shares soared as disappointing data from rival Eli Lilly & Co.’s closely watched obesity pill bolstered investor hopes about the Danish drugmaker’s ability to compete in the burgeoning market.】

item.title: 咖啡在巴西出口下降和美国关税威胁之后反弹
item.description: 咖啡期货上涨，原因是头号种植国巴西的出货量下降，有可能导致全球咖啡市场供应紧张，而美国对巴西商品征收关税的威胁已经给这个市场带来了压力。【原文：Coffee futures gained as a decline in shipments from top grower Brazil threatens to tighten global supplies in a market that’s already under pressure from the threat of US tariffs on the country’s goods.】
